short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 3rd party matchmaking, custom skins/sfx/gfx, and many more improvements to jstris!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jstris+ is an all in one extension/userscript for Jstris that adds a few long-sought features to the game we all love:

ðŸ”¹ Skill based matchmaking Hidden MMR, to get into a close, fun match without ranking anxiety
ðŸ”¹ Graphical Effects Togglable and adjustable to add just the right amount of spice
ðŸ”¹ Custom Skins / SFX Easily apply custom skins and SFX without the hassle!
ðŸ”¹ Spectator Sound Effects Finally, Jstris tournaments don't need to be silent (and you can hear your opponent 4widing you in advance)

Please join the discord to stay up to date!
https://discord.gg/mtX8ek82xb
